byline.contributor: Karin Roberts contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Authorities in Russia and United States announce they have signed agreement that will regulate airspace over Syria.
lead_paragraph: The defense departments of both countries said the deal established safety protocols for all aircraft and drone flights to prevent any incidents.

headline.main: U.S. Agrees With Russia on Rules in Syrian Sky
headline.print_headline: U.S. Agrees With Russia on Rules in Syrian Sky

snippet: The defense departments of both countries said the deal established safety protocols for all aircraft and drone flights to prevent any incidents.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
